title: Kingston Brass KB1970AX Heritage 8" Widespread Lavatory Faucet with Brass Pop-Up, 6-1/2" in Spout Reach, Matte Black
features: 1.2 GPM/4.5 LPM Spout Flow Rate at 60 PSI.Do not use any abrasive cleaning agents
description: A lavish spark of traditionally stylized glamour is brought to your bathroom ensemble with this beautiful faucet. Ideal for more spacious bathrooms, widespread faucets are more spread apart and feature a 3-hole installation. The Heritage 8-inch widespread bathroom faucet and its featured sturdy brass construction and premium matte black finish are guaranteed to glamorize your home's traditional ensemble for years to come. Celebrate sophistication and traditional decor with this statement piece. A matching finish drain is also included.
